meanings.definition: To apply fresh ink to (a stamp or printing device).
meanings.sent1: I will reink the stamp before using it again.
meanings.sent2: She always makes sure to reink the printer before starting a new project.
meanings.sent3: The stamp felt happy to get a fresh coat of reink.
meanings.sent4: The printer hummed with joy as it received a fresh reink.
meanings.sent5: The reink made the stamp look brand new and ready to go.

meanings.definition: Fresh ink used for printing or writing.
meanings.sent1: The reink smelled fresh and inviting.
meanings.sent2: He bought a bottle of reink for his calligraphy set.
meanings.sent3: The reink bottle rolled off the table and made a colorful mess.
meanings.sent4: Her words flowed smoothly with the help of the vibrant reink.
meanings.sent5: The reink added a pop of color to the page, making it stand out.
